item.title: Super Bowls Are Not the Ultimate Metric For Denver
item.description: The Denver Broncos have been consistently bad over the last six seasons, ever since hall of fame quarterback and the undisputed GOAT Peyton Manning retired. However, they are a highly decorated team, having won three Super Bowls (tied for 7th most) and having appeared in eight of the big games (tied for 3rd most). Many argue as to whether Manning or John Elway was the best Broncos quarterback of all time, but Iâ€™m more interested in which team was the best.

item.title: What is the best Denver Broncos team since 1990?
